lead_paragraph: Bristol-Myers Squibb said the drug had not slowed the progression of advanced lung cancer in a test seeking approval to use it as an initial treatment.

headline.print_headline: Immunotherapy Drug Fails Lung Cancer Trial
headline.main: Immunotherapy Drug Opdivo Fails Clinical Trial to Expand Use

snippet: Bristol-Myers Squibb said the drug had not slowed the progression of advanced lung cancer in a test seeking approval to use it as an initial treatment....
abstract: Bristol-Myers Squibb says its best-selling immunotherapy drug Opdivo failed as initial treatment for lung cancer in clinical trial; announcement plunges manufacturer's shares 16 percent and raises value of shares of rival Merck, makers of Keytruda, immunotherapy medication that succeeded in similar clinical trial.
